item.description:
Event details at: http://wakefieldepc.com/shamrock.aspx

Come check out all that Wakefield has to offer!  Our town rocks in so many way!

I'm using the liquor store for the address but it's the entire plaza - including a GIANT expo inside the former workout gym there.

Wakefield expo and Irish festival 1-5 pm on Sat. 3/16! Greenwood Wine and Spirits between 1 pm and 4 pm will have an Irish Beer Tasting to "Celebrate the Green". Choose to sample from more than 25 beers or just drop in to enter our raffle! Visit the Guinness table and learn how to make a Black and Tan!

Stop by my Boston Home Health table to learn about mental health and physical health visiting nurse services as well as home health aid, social worker, physical therapy and more services available to people in need of assistance in Wakefield and surrounding areas!

This is more of a come by yourself or with friends/family event.  I'm not really "hosting" since I'll be to my table.  Hope to see some "old" and new faces!  :)

I will update the list of participating businesses and RESTAURANTS soon!
item.name: Wakefield Expo and Irish Festival! Free tastings, raffles, entertainment, more!
